content: i ve been searching for a while for a quick easy bootie pattern to knit for charity that uses up left over dk yarn has built in ties and doesn t require picking up stitches pretty big ask so after some fruitless searching i decided to get designing i love the idea of having an all-in-one bootie with ties as tie-on bootie stay on wiggly toes much better also with the ties joined to the bootie there s no worry about the ties coming loose and getting lost each pair uses approximately 28 m of dk light worsted weight yarn around 15 g if you have some spare time and some spare yarn it would be great if you could make a pair or two for a local charity too materials needles 4 mm yarn dk light worsted weight 28 m alternatively you could use 2 strands of 4 ply/sport/fingering weight yarn held together or worsted weight yarn for slightly larger booties sewing needle for sewing in ends and seams
